import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";function configs(labels,datasets){var backgroundColors=[];datasets.backgroundColors.forEach(function(color){if(color==="secondary"||color==="primary"||color==="dark"||color==="warning"){backgroundColors.push(colors.gradients[color].state);}else{backgroundColors.push(colors.gradients[color].main);}});return{data:{labels:labels,datasets:[{label:datasets.label,weight:9,cutout:60,tension:1,pointRadius:2,borderWidth:2,backgroundColor:backgroundColors,data:datasets.data,fill:false}]},options:{responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:false,plugins:{legend:{display:false}},interaction:{intersect:false,mode:"index"},scales:{y:{grid:{drawBorder:false,display:false,drawOnChartArea:false,drawTicks:false},ticks:{display:false}},x:{grid:{drawBorder:false,display:false,drawOnChartArea:false,drawTicks:false},ticks:{display:false}}}}};}export default configs;
